long_description: Sweat in the eyes is never a pleasant experience, especially while cycling where it can be downright dangerous. The Halo V headband works to block sweat and channel it away from your face. Rip-and-stick closure ensures a personalized fit and won't pull hair. Tapered headband fits under a helmet and easily behind your ears. Dryline(R) fabric works hard to wick moisture and dry quickly.
short_description: Sweat in the eyes is never a pleasant experience, especially while cycling where it can be downright dangerous. The Halo V headband works to block sweat and channel it away from your face.
